message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.NE, cs.CV 

Reasoning: The paper discusses the capabilities of recurrent neural networks (RNNs) in learning and generalizing from different tasks, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also mentions the use of RNNs in natural language processing (cs.CL) and computer vision (cs.CV), which are subfields of AI. Additionally, the paper discusses the use of gradient descent and evolutionary strategies in training RNNs, which falls under the category of neural networks (cs.NE).
